short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter Gotham's dark side with an intense Joker-themed live wallpaper that electrifies every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring Joker’s mystique to life with a card flip live wallpaper, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for unique browsing..

Step into the world of intrigue and chaos with the Joker Card Flip Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Each new tab reveals high-definition, animated scenes of the Joker flipping his iconic playing card, blending mystery and flair. Perfect for Joker fans and admirers of dark, edgy aesthetics, this extension captures the essence of Gotham’s trickster, adding a captivating twist to your browsing experience.

The extension also includes a built-in Google search bar for quick browsing and customizable quick-access icons, making it easy to navigate to your favorite sites. This blend of dynamic visuals and functional tools keeps browsing efficient yet thrilling..

Ideal for fans of villains and dark themes, the Joker Card Flip Live Wallpaper extension transforms each tab into a mesmerizing show of suspense and style.

Features:

Joker Card Flip Live Wallpaper: Animated high-definition scenes of Joker’s iconic card flip.
Google Search Bar: Quick and seamless browsing with integrated search.
Customizable Quick-Access Icons: Personalize shortcuts to favorite sites.
High-Quality Villain Visuals: Intense imagery capturing Joker’s mystique.
Stylish and Functional: Adds a dark edge to your browsing tools.
Perfect for Joker Fans: A touch of Gotham’s trickster in every tab.
